claim.text: We introduce REPLUG, a retrieval-augmented language modeling framework that treats the language model (LM) as a black box and augments it with a tuneable retrieval model.
claim.exact_quote: We introduce REPLUG, a retrieval-augmented language modeling framework that treats the language model (LM) as a black box and augments it with a tuneable retrieval model.

evidence.evidence_text: We introduce REPLUG, a retrieval-augmented language modeling framework that treats the language model (LM) as a black box and augments it with a tuneable retrieval model.
evidence.exact_quote: We introduce REPLUG, a retrieval-augmented language modeling framework that treats the language model (LM) as a black box and augments it with a tuneable retrieval model.

claim.text: Unlike prior retrieval-augmented LMs that train language models with special cross attention mechanisms to encode the retrieved text, REPLUG simply prepends retrieved documents to the input for the frozen black-box LM.
claim.exact_quote: Unlike prior retrieval-augmented LMs that train language models with special cross attention mechanisms to encode the retrieved text, REPLUG simply prepends retrieved documents to the input for the frozen black-box LM.

evidence.evidence_text: Unlike prior retrieval-augmented LMs that train language models with special cross attention mechanisms to encode the retrieved text, REPLUG simply prepends retrieved documents to the input for the frozen black-box LM.
evidence.exact_quote: Unlike prior retrieval-augmented LMs that train language models with special cross attention mechanisms to encode the retrieved text, REPLUG simply prepends retrieved documents to the input for the frozen black-box LM.

claim.text: This simple design can be easily applied to any existing language models.
claim.exact_quote: This simple design can be easily applied to any existing language models.

evidence.evidence_text: This simple design can be easily applied to any existing language models.
evidence.exact_quote: This simple design can be easily applied to any existing language models.

claim.text: Furthermore, we show that the LM can be used to supervise the retrieval model, which can then find documents that help the LM make better predictions.
claim.exact_quote: Furthermore, we show that the LM can be used to supervise the retrieval model, which can then find documents that help the LM make better predictions.

evidence.evidence_text: Furthermore, we show that the LM can be used to supervise the retrieval model, which can then find documents that help the LM make better predictions.
evidence.exact_quote: Furthermore, we show that the LM can be used to supervise the retrieval model, which can then find documents that help the LM make better predictions.

claim.text: Our experiments demonstrate that REPLUG with the tuned retriever significantly improves the performance of GPT-3 (175B) on language modeling by 6.3%, as well as the performance of Codex on five-shot MMLU by 5.1%.
claim.exact_quote: Our experiments demonstrate that REPLUG with the tuned retriever significantly improves the performance of GPT-3 (175B) on language modeling by 6.3%, as well as the performance of Codex on five-shot MMLU by 5.1%.

evidence.evidence_text: Our experiments demonstrate that REPLUG with the tuned retriever significantly improves the performance of GPT-3 (175B) on language modeling by 6.3%, as well as the performance of Codex on five-shot MMLU by 5.1%.
evidence.exact_quote: Our experiments demonstrate that REPLUG with the tuned retriever significantly improves the performance of GPT-3 (175B) on language modeling by 6.3%, as well as the performance of Codex on five-shot MMLU by 5.1%.
